super_attack.name: Dodon Ray
super_attack.effect: Causes supreme damage to enemy; Greatly lowers DEF

passive_skill.name: Psychokinetic Disruption
passive_skill.effect: Per Extreme Class ally on the team: ATK & DEF 30% up; Chance of evading enemy's attack 7% up (up to 35%); Per "DB Saga" or "Earthlings" Category ally on the team (depending on which Category has more members): ATK & DEF 30% up; Chance of evading enemy's attack 7% up (up to 35%); When there is another "DB Saga" or "Earthlings" Category ally attacking in the same turn: Randomly changes Ki Spheres of a certain Type to Rainbow Ki Spheres; ATK & DEF 100% up and damage reduction rate 40% up when attacking; When attacking with 12 or more Ki: ATK & DEF 100% up; Starting from the 5th turn from the start of battle: (Once) Stuns all enemies

active_skill.name: Telekinesis
active_skill.effect: Causes ultimate damage to enemy,; greatly lowers ATK & DEF for 1 turn; Seals Super Attack for 1 turn; "DB Saga" or "Earthlings" Category allies'; ATK +16% and DEF +27% for 1 turn; (self excluded)
active_skill.activation_conditions: Can be activated when all allies attacking in the same turn are Extreme Class Or when facing only 1 enemy starting from the 5th turn from the start of battle (once only)
